title: [领地插件]关于领地插件的圈地大小
author: redmhorse
txt_content: 我是服主,想圈块地,但是出现下面的问还有我想知道买地的具体设置,我知道价格,但是是不是默认开启买地的?

replies.txt_content:
在服务器根目录打开plugins文件夹，并找到Residence的配置文件目录，进去打开config.yml
       Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 10#一个玩家所能拥有领地数量上限
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 5#一个领地的最大物理区域数目
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 1000#东西长度
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 1000#南北长度
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 256#高
将红字修改为你需要的内容即可

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
可以去我的帖子提问-w- 

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-320667-1-1.html

PS：LZ不会设置称号=a=

replies.author: ztq
replies.txt_content: 那个。。。op的指令是不同的说，你要输的是：/resadmin create <领地名>

replies.author: redmhorse
replies.txt_content:
ztq 发表于 2014-8-13 15:15
那个。。。op的指令是不同的说，你要输的是：/resadmin create
 # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 50
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to 

West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to 

South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to 

Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 
           # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MinHeight: 
           # The highest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MaxHeight: 

如果这一段留空会不行吗
那最好设置多少,有什么限制么

在服务器根目录打开plugins文件夹，并找到Residence的配置文件目录，进去打开config.yml
       Residence: ...
如果留空是不是不行啊,我想尽量让领地无限大

redmhorse 发表于 2014-8-13 15:33
如果留空是不是不行啊,我想尽量让领地无限大
你输入999999999999999999999999999999999就可以无限了呀
